concept.title: Goals and Satisfaction Guarantee
concept.shortdesc: Here at AirClassroom, our #1 goal is to provide you with an excellent experience.

dlentry.dd: 1. To provide the customer with an excellent rental experience.
2. To ensure the customer has what they need to succeed.
3. To appeal to a wide range of potential clients.
4. Represent the core values and principles of community at Virginia Tech.
5. Provide students and professionals with a service that they will recommend to others. If you believe we are not adhering or accomplishing any of these goals, let us know how we can improve!

section.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
section.p: AirClassroom provides customers with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied with your rental experience, let us know why. If your reasoning is determined to be adequate and understandable, we will provide you with a full refund and encourage you to suggest how we improve to better meet you and others' needs.
